title: I Don’t Care, So Let Me Go Home! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Cold Love Interests   Dragons   Female Protagonist   Honest Protagonist   Knights   Lazy Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Manipulative Characters   Mob Protagonist   Multiple POV   Nobles   Quirky Characters   R-15   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Transformation Ability   Villainess Noble Girls   Wizards
author: Haineko Hiro   [email protected] Hiro   ねこにゃん@灰猫陽路   灰猫陽路
description:
A count’s daughter who scored hopelessly on the school's exam, Rururia Talbot!

I was talking to my best friend Sarah while eating my favorite tart, before I ran into a fight between the Crown Prince Christoph and Duke’s daughter, Irene.

And now I'm involved in their engagement's annulment during the graduation party?! 

A series of hardships and trials follow.

The fantasy rom-com of a count's daughter who just wants to return home peacefully begins!>
